name: Baby Boom Game
description:
♥Give each baby exactly what it needs to keep it healthy and happy!♥

♥Keep your head healthy, managing a kindergarten is not easy, and you have to deal with a lot of stress. ♥ If a baby cries too much you will lose a life!♥
♥Please rate our app! ♥ Write a review, we appreciate your feedback! ♥
